-- =============================================================================
-- API Analytics Demo
-- Azure Synapse Analytics Demo
-- https://github.com/aessing/demo-azuresynapse
-- -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- Developer.......: Andre Essing (https://www.andre-essing.de/)
--                                (https://github.com/aessing)
--                                (https://twitter.com/aessing)
--                                (https://www.linkedin.com/in/aessing/)
-- -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- THIS CODE AND INFORMATION ARE PROVIDED "AS IS" WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND,
-- EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE IMPLIED
-- WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND/OR FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.
-- =============================================================================

-- This script will create the views in the Serverless database pointing to the
-- curated area PARQUET files for direct analysis from the data lake.

-- #############################################################################
-- DON'T FORGET TO CHOOSE BUILT-IN AND THE CORRECT DATABASE
-- #############################################################################

-- -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- Create an external datasource to connect views to the data lake
-- -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'eds_apianalytics') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [eds_apianalytics] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION   = 'https://demosynapsedls01.dfs.core.windows.net/apianalytics'
	)
GO

-- -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- Create API Analytics schema 'api'
-- -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.schemas WHERE name = 'api') 
	EXEC('CREATE SCHEMA [api]')
GO

-- -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- Create views needed
-- -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- Create Customers View
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE NAME = 'Customers' AND TYPE = 'V')
	DROP VIEW api.Customers
GO
CREATE VIEW api.Customers
AS
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'curated/customers.parquet/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'eds_apianalytics',
	    FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
GO

-- Create Geodata View
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE NAME = 'Geodata' AND TYPE = 'V')
	DROP VIEW api.Geodata
GO

FROM

        BULK 'curated/geodata.parquet/*.parquet',

	    FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
GO

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE NAME = 'Operations' AND TYPE = 'V')

GO

GO

-- Create Services View

GO

-- Create Timeseries View

GO

GO
